issue.title: [Plasma] Pull SerializationContext through PlasmaClient put and get
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1438](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1438). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Expose the SerializationContext through PlasmaClient.put and get.

I'd be good to get this into 0.7 so Ray can use that version.

comments.body:
